testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (search form, buttons, villa cards)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application shows BeachStay Villas branding and content
Confirm featured villas section loads with actual villa data
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional BeachStay Villas features with villa listings, search functionality, and interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or generic content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Content and Layout Test
testCases.description: Test that homepage displays proper content and layout
steps: Load the homepage at root URL
Verify hero section with beach villa background image
Check search form with location, check-in, check-out, and guests fields
Verify 'Featured Villas' section displays villa cards
Check 'Popular Beach Destinations' section
Verify navigation bar with BeachStay Villas logo and menu items
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays complete BeachStay Villas layout with hero section, search functionality, and villa listings

testCases.name: Villa Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test the villa search feature works properly
steps: Enter a location in the search field (e.g., 'Santa Monica')
Select check-in and check-out dates
Set number of guests
Click the Search button
Verify navigation to search results page
Check that search parameters are preserved in URL
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works and navigates to results page with proper parameters

testCases.name: Navigation Menu Test
testCases.description: Test navigation menu functionality and links
steps: Click on BeachStay Villas logo to verify it returns to homepage
Test 'List Your Villa' button functionality
Click on user profile menu (guest state)
Verify login and signup options appear
Test mobile menu toggle on smaller screens
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation elements work properly and provide appropriate menu options

testCases.name: Villa Cards Display Test
testCases.description: Test that villa cards display properly with all required information
steps: Scroll to Featured Villas section
Verify villa cards show images, titles, locations, and prices
Check that star ratings and review counts are displayed
Verify bedroom, bed, and bathroom counts are shown
Test that villa cards are clickable and lead to detail pages
testCases.expectedOutcome: Villa cards display complete information and are interactive

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test user login and signup functionality
steps: Click on user profile menu
Click 'Sign Up' to navigate to signup page
Verify signup form displays with required fields
Navigate back and click 'Log In'
Verify login form displays properly
Test form validation and error handling
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication pages load properly with functional forms

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test homepage on desktop viewport (1200px+)
Test on tablet viewport (768px-1199px)
Test on mobile viewport (320px-767px)
Verify mobile menu appears on smaller screens
Check that search form adapts to mobile layout
Verify villa cards stack properly on mobile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly across all screen sizes with appropriate mobile adaptations

testCases.name: Villa Detail Page Test
steps: Click on a featured villa card from homepage
Verify navigation to villa detail page
Check that villa information displays (title, description, amenities)
Verify image gallery or main photo displays
Check pricing information and booking options
Test back navigation to previous page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Villa detail pages load with complete information and booking functionality

testCases.name: Host Features Test
steps: Click 'List Your Villa' button
Verify navigation to host onboarding page
Check that host signup/onboarding form displays
Test host dashboard accessibility (if authenticated)
Verify host-specific menu options appear when logged in as host
testCases.expectedOutcome: Host features are accessible and functional for property owners

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and 404 pages
steps: Navigate to a non-existent URL (e.g., /nonexistent-page)
Verify 404 error page displays
Test navigation back to homepage from error page
Check that broken villa links show appropriate error messages
Verify network error handling for API calls
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate error pages and messages

testCases.name: Basic Performance Test
testCases.description: Test basic application performance and loading
steps: Measure homepage initial load time
Check that images load progressively
Verify smooth scrolling and interactions
Test search functionality response time
Check for any console errors or warnings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly with smooth interactions and no critical errors

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Test
steps: Test keyboard navigation through main elements
Verify form labels and ARIA attributes
Check color contrast for text readability
Test screen reader compatibility for main content
Verify focus indicators are visible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application meets basic accessibility standards with proper keyboard navigation and screen reader support

testCases.name: Booking Flow Test
steps: Navigate to a villa detail page
Select dates and number of guests
Click booking/reserve button
Verify navigation to booking page
Check that booking form displays with guest details
Test price calculation and summary display
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking flow works properly with accurate pricing and guest information collection

testCases.name: Wishlist Functionality Test
steps: Look for heart/wishlist icons on villa cards
Test adding villas to wishlist (if authenticated)
Navigate to wishlist page from user menu
Verify saved villas display in wishlist
Test removing items from wishlist
testCases.expectedOutcome: Wishlist functionality allows users to save and manage favorite villas

testCases.name: Search Filters Test
testCases.description: Test advanced search filters and sorting
steps: Navigate to search results page
Look for filter options (price, bedrooms, amenities)
Apply various filters and verify results update
Test sorting options (price, rating, etc.)
Verify filter persistence when navigating back
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search filters work properly and help users refine villa search results
